title: EBSI Verifiable Accredidation
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Accredidation for Education issuer

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Accreditation

issuer.description: Defines the issuer of the Verifiable Accreditation

issuanceDate.description: Defines when the Verifiable Accreditation was issued

validFrom.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Accreditation becomes valid

expirationDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Accreditation expires

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable Accreditation’s validity

authorizationClaims.description: a list of claims that define/determine the authorization of an Issuer to issue certain types of VCs

decision.description: The Quality Decision issued by the Quality Assuring Authority

report.description: A publicly accessible report of the quality assurance decision

limitField.description: The field of education for which the accreditation is valid

limitEQFLevel.description: The european qualification level for which the accreditation is valid

limitJurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction for which the accreditation is valid

reviewDate.description: The date when the accreditation has to be re-viewed

credentialStatus.description: Contains information about how to verify the status of the Verifiable Accreditation (via the Revocation and Endorsement Registry, RER)

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable Accreditation’s validity

type.description: Defines the Verifiable Credential status type

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable Accreditation is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Accreditation is based

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: References the issuance policy stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) that has been followed for issuing the Verifiable Accreditation

verifier.description: Defines entity which has verified documents before Verifiable Accreditation issuance

evidenceDocument.description: Defines document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Accreditation issuance

subjectPresence.description: Defines if the Verifiable Accreditation subject was physically present in the course of the verification

documentPresence.description: Defines how the document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Accreditation issuance have been provided (e.g. physically, digitally)

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format
